main event: A missile launch from Vandenberg Air Force Base was observed from Idaho to Mexico, creating an impression of an explosive and varied colored pattern in the sky.
interesting points: The missile launch occurred at twilight, leading to significant public interest and media inquiries., Over 120 phone calls were received from news media and civil authorities following the sighting., The natural phenomena caused by the launch created varied colored patterns due to the Earth's shadow and atmospheric density changes., The report indicates that this type of observation can cause speculation and concern among the public., The exhaust trail from the missile is particularly visible during twilight due to specific atmospheric conditions.
sighted object: unidentified flying object (UFO) linked to a missile launch
witness description: telephone queries from news media and civil authorities
